directions: In a bowl whisk together zest, lemon juice, vinegar, and salt and pepper to taste and whisk in oil, whisking until dressing is emulsified.
Put tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocados in 3 separate bowls and toss with dressing. Vegetables may be prepared 2 hours ahead and chilled, covered.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon finely grated fresh lemon zest
title: Tomato, Cucumber, and Avocado with Lemon Vinaigrette
